description:
Whether you’re repairing equipment or people, rounded patches are less likely to peel off. Scissors make it easy to cut custom curves in bandages, duct tape, moleskin, and fabrics. Your mom told you never to run with scissors, nor should you hike with them, unless, like these little beauties, they fold up for safe, compact carrying.

  • Chrome-plated diecast handle and stainless steel blades
name: Coghlan's Folding Scissors
